UI.noInput: Please answer before viewing the solution

question: What is printed as a result of executing print(fileobj.readline())?

answers.text: The first line of input.txt is printed.

tipsAndFeedback.chosenFeedback: There is no error for the given line of code provided fileobj is associated with a file.

answers.text: The contents of the file input.txt are printed.

tipsAndFeedback.chosenFeedback: The readline() function does not print the entire file contents.

The readline() function reads the next line of a file. Since readline() is called right after opening the file the first line is read. The resulting string "Hello world!" is printed. Note that readline() includes the '\n' character so the print will include an additional newline.

detailedSolution: The readline() function reads the next line of a file. Since readline() is called right after opening the file the first line is read. The resulting string "Hello world!" is printed. Note that readline() includes the '\n' character so the print will include an additional newline.
